department.ch: 客家語文暨社會科學學系
department.en: Department of Hakka Language and Social Sciences

goal.ch: 幫助學生在面對不同議題上 可以有效地練習和增進口說和寫作技巧
goal.en:
(1) To practice and improve speaking and writing higher level English dealing with more mature or controversial subjects.
(2) To assistant students with fluency English communication skills to fit in this multi-cultural world, which may help them to have better plans for their both foreign and domestic further study.

outline.ch:
本課程主要在加強英文的口說和寫作技巧 故將這兩部分每週穿插授課與練習
在口說方面 涵蓋了下列議題
- 圖表(bar/ line/ pie chart/ table / map)描述練習(增加/穩定/下降/比較)
- punctuation 標點符號
- people/ job/study 人和職業科系
- society/ cities/ towns 社會和城市與鄉鎮
- leisure time/ hobbies/ sports 休閒時光和運動
- fashion/ shopping/ music and arts 時尚和藝術
- food ＆ heath/ accommodation 飲食和健康與住宿
- travel ＆ Transportation/ weather 旅遊與交通和天氣
- life experiences/ communication 人生經歷與溝通
根據當週主題 再分成三大步驟 來進行練習
- 回答關於自己的問題
- 針對task card進行回答
- 回答延伸問題
在寫作方面 涵蓋了下列議題
- 圖表(bar/ line/ pie chart/ table / map)描述練習(增加/穩定/下降/比較/轉變)
- 贊成與否/ 優缺點表達
- 因果/ 引用
- 闡述與舉例
- 教育/社會情況表達的相關句型練習
- 家庭/健康情況表達的相關句型練習
-法律/政策情況表達的相關句型練習
-環境/全球情況表達的相關句型練習
outline.en: While learners study a language, they are expected to be able to learn the most with the awareness of their learning autonomy and the willingness to express themselves actively in learning processes.  Thus, based on that, this class will help students to improve skills necessary for better successful English communication and writing, through the use of English as the medium of instruction and other classroom interactive activities.
